name: strava-club-results
description: Aggregate race results from running club members' Strava accounts

scripts.dev: npm run dev --workspace=workers & npm run dev --workspace=frontend
scripts.build: npm run build --workspace=workers && npm run build --workspace=frontend
scripts.db:migrate: npx wrangler d1 execute strava-club-db --file=database/schema.sql --config wrangler.workers.toml
scripts.db:migrations:apply: npx wrangler d1 migrations apply strava-club-db --config wrangler.workers.toml
scripts.db:migrations:list: npx wrangler d1 migrations list strava-club-db --config wrangler.workers.toml
